Title: Indemnifies department of motor vehicle employees for processing non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits which do not meet federal standards for identification
Summary: Indemnifies department of motor vehicle employees for processing non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits which do not meet federal standards for identification when such license is used or involved in certain criminal acts.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the indemnification of department of motor vehicle employees for processing non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits which do not meet federal standards for identification
